title: What's in cranberry juice?
body:
http://www.todayifoundout.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/cranberry-juice.jpg


I used to fkn hate it and I went around telling everyone it was the worst thing I drank and I will never like it...

I told my friend that about 2 months ago and now I fkn love it and I'm addicted O .O...
